mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId, c.comment AS comment, a.artist_id AS writerId, a.artist_name AS writerName, a.artist_image AS writerImage, c.register_datetime AS registerDateTime, c.modify_datetime AS modifyDateTime FROM comment c LEFT OUTER JOIN artist a ON a.artist_id = c.writer_id WHERE 1=1 AND c.comment_id = #{commentId} AND c.deleted = 0

SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId, c.comment AS comment, a.artist_id AS writerId, a.artist_name AS writerName, a.artist_image AS writerImage, c.register_datetime AS registerDateTime, c.modify_datetime AS modifyDateTime FROM comment c LEFT OUTER JOIN artist a ON a.artist_id = c.writer_id WHERE 1=1 AND c.music_id = #{musicId} AND c.deleted = 0 ORDER BY IF((ISNULL(c.parent_comment_id) OR c.parent_comment_id = 0), c.comment_id, c.parent_comment_id) DESC, c.register_datetime DESC LIMIT #{startOffset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM comment c WHERE 1=1 AND c.music_id = #{musicId} AND c.deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( parent_comment_id, comment, writer_id, music_id, artist_id, register_datetime, modify_datetime ) VALUES ( #{parentCommentId}, #{comment}, #{writerId}, #{musicId}, #{artistId}, NOW(), NOW() )
